author: The Editorial Board
title: Trump’s Pennsylvania Downdraft
text:
The Republican hold on Congress grew more tenuous Tuesday with Democrat Conor Lamb’s apparent victory in a special election in the heart of Trump country. The GOP will need a better strategy in November than imposing tariffs and donning Nancy Pelosi fright masks.
Donald Trump won Pennsylvania’s 18th Congressional district by nearly 20 points in 2016, but Hillary Clinton isn’t on the ballot anymore. The Democrats nominated a better candidate in Mr. Lamb, a 33-year-old former Marine who toned down the anti-Trump resistance...
